data.title: Obituary for CORY D. BARRINGER
data.meta_description: Obituary for CORY BARRINGER | Indianapolis, IN | ...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for CORY D. BARRINGER | Stuart Mortuary, Inc
data.text:
Cory DuJuan Barringer was born on March 26, 1978, in Indianapolis, Indiana. He was the son of Henry Neal and Darlene Barringer.

Cory accepted Christ as his Lord and Savior at an early age. He received his education within the Indianapolis Public School System and later he received his GED.

Cory was a member at International Hod Carriers and Laborers Local Union #120. He was employed at Milestone Contractor.

Those who knew Cory know we loss someone truly special. Cory was a caring and loving fiancée, father, son, brother, grandson, nephew, cousin, friend and “PaPa”. Truly a real self-made, standup guy.

Cory could light up the room with his presence. A man that was funny, intelligent, honest (too honest) and loyal to his family and friends.

Cory enjoyed entertaining, cooking, gaming with his buddies and fishing. The thing he loved the most was spending time with his family, and the love between him and his mother was unbreakable.

Cory will truly be missed and never forgotten. Cory DuJuan Barringer departed this life on Monday, August 30, 2021, at the age of forty-three years.

He leaves to cherish his memory, fiancée, Lakiana “Kia” McReynolds; son, Durane Barringer, Sr.; daughter, Kori Barringer; mother, Darlene Barringer; brother, Jeremy Barringer; grandmother, Mossie Barringer; grandchildren, Durane Barringer, Jr. Duruan Barringer and Omari McReynolds; niece, Journey Barringer; God-mother, Joyce Blunt, and a host of aunts and uncles, many cousins and friends.

Lovingly Submitted………..…..The Family
